title: Could we be completely wrong about the big bang theory? - Quora

response.answer_text: That there was some sort of Big Bang is on extremely strong observational grounds. It is also in accord with general relativity, which has passed every test for a hundred years. The questions have moved on to others like what is dark matter, is dark energy constant with time, and was there an inflationary era (highly likely) and what kind of field drive the inflation.
